about.text1: Played with computers since I can remember. Not only games, but scripts, DOS comands, etc..
about.text2: Broke them a lot and watched them get repaired beak it even more.
about.text3: Started programming on a 386 in Basic and 3D modeling in 3D Studio Max.
about.text4: Programed during grammar school, high school and university, entered several programming competitions (and won some).
about.text5: IT gadgets are my thing, but I dont like social networks.
about.text6: Enjoy hacking stories - Mr. Robot, Malicious Life and Darknet Diaries podcasts.
